synopsis.text: Hamura Shou transfers to an all-boys academy, where he believes he has found his long-lost twin brother Kai. However, Kai denies their relationship. Meanwhile, legends tell of the peaceful kingdom of Winfield, whose white-winged royal family possessed magical abilities before being overthrown. After a mysterious earthquake, Shou and some fellow students are transported to the magical world of Winfield. There, Shou discovers he has white wings and magical powers, linking him to Winfield's fallen royal lineage. He and his friends must use their newfound abilities to battle dangerous monsters now threatening Winfield. However, Shou also encounters people with black wings pursuing their own agenda. With his twin denying their bond and Winfield in turmoil, Shou faces a difficult path ahead as he uncovers the secrets of his inheritance.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
